title: An Equal-Weight Approach to Big Tech Mitigates Concentration Risk
text: Mega-cap technology stocks climbed after Microsoft and Alphabet reported better-than-expected earnings yesterday. Microsoft (MSFT) missed on both revenue and profit expectations, but the stock rose on the firm's upbeat guidance for the current fiscal year.

title: Microsoft Q4 Earnings Miss, Outlook Solid: ETFs to Tap
text: Microsoft (MSFT) ended its long track of beating estimates by missing on both earnings and revenues but issued an optimistic growth forecast.

title: Microsoft Stock Is Powering the Market. The Company Sees Continued Double-Digit Growth.
text: Microsoft June-quarter results were a little soft, but cloud demand remains robust. And the software giant's upbeat forecast for the June 2023 fiscal year is buoying the stock—and the broader market.

title: What Is Going on With Microsoft (MSFT) Stock Today?
text: Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT ) stock is rallying 5% today as investors and analysts were pleased with the company's full-year guidance. Specifically, the tech giant predicted that its top line and operating income would jump by double-digit percentage levels during its current fiscal year.

title: Microsoft FY 2023 Outlook Signals Growth 'Azure'd'
text: Microsoft's F4Q revenue and earnings miss amplifies how even the biggest and most resilient business cannot fully escape from the grip of a global economic downturn. Yet, the provision of a solid forward guidance for FY'23 yesterday reinforces investors' hopes that Microsoft's recession-proof cloud-computing and critical enterprise software businesses can overcome the near-term headwinds.

title: 'Bullish guidance heard around the world': Microsoft jumps 5% as it's quarterly earnings show resilience amid recession worries
text: Wedbush analyst Dan Ives called Microsoft's cloud results "a rock solid performance in this backdrop and speaks to the trajectory looking forward."

title: 2 Types of Tech Stocks to Buy After Google and Microsoft Save the Market

title: Microsoft: Reassuring Q4 FY22 Results And New FY23 Outlook
text: MSFT stock rose 4.0% in aftermarket trading after Q4 FY22 results and new FY23 outlook points to double-digit EBIT growth continuing. Q4 FY22 saw revenues grew 16% and EBIT grew 14% in local currencies, but currency and tax meant EPS grew 3% in USD.

title: Upbeat Forecast Helps Microsoft Stock Brush Off Earnings Miss
text: Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) is managing a post-earnings pop this morning, last seen up 4% at $262.39, even after the tech giant's fiscal fourth-quarter earnings of $2.23 per share and revenue missed analysts' expectations.

title: Microsoft's earnings were a miss, but here's why no one is panicking
text: Microsoft Corp.'s outlook helped send its stock higher despite an earnings miss late Tuesday, but it became the subject of controversy among Wall Street analysts, who couldn't agree on whether the forecast was too much, not enough, or just right.

title: Microsoft, Alphabet earnings lift futures ahead of Fed decision
text: U.S. stock index futures rose on Wednesday as better-than-feared quarterly reports from technology giants Microsoft and Alphabet calmed investors ahead of a key U.S. interest rate decision later in the day.

title: U.S. stock futures bounce back ahead of Fed decision as investors give a pass to earnings misses from Alphabet and Microsoft
text: U.S. stock futures rose on Wednesday, climbing ahead of a Federal Reserve rate decision where the focus will be on how aggressive the central bank thinks it needs to be to get inflation under control.
